sentences.en: I always felt that Mary was not equipped for motherhood.
sentences.cn: 我总认为玛丽不具备做母亲的条件.

sentences.en: Our yacht was well equipped with two double cabins fore and aft.
sentences.cn: 我们的游艇设施完备，首尾有两个双人舱。

sentences.en: Rooms vary in size and come equipped with hairdriers, television and telephone.
sentences.cn: 房间大小不同,均配有吹风机 、 电视和电话.

sentences.en: Some students have emotional problems that teachers feel ill equipped to handle.
sentences.cn: 一些学生的情感问题令老师们束手无策。

sentences.en: The army is very poorly equipped.
The greenhouses come equipped with a ventilating system and aluminium screen door.
sentences.cn: 那些温室送来时配有通风系统和铝制纱门。

sentences.en: The infantry were equipped with flame throwers.
The kitchen is compact but well equipped.
sentences.cn: 这间厨房虽然小但设备齐全。

sentences.en: The sports complex is huge and superbly well-equipped.
sentences.cn: 这个综合体育馆规模巨大，设备一流。

sentences.en: They had equipped their workers adequately for such dangerous condition.
sentences.cn: 他们让工人们充分装备起来,以应付这样的危险情况.

sentences.en: They massed well - equipped troops on the frontier.
sentences.cn: 他们在边境上集结了装备精良的军队.

sentences.en: This type of inefficiency arises because workers and management are ill - equipped.
sentences.cn: 出现此种低效率是因为工人与管理层都能力不足.

sentences.en: Universities were ill-equipped to meet the massive intake of students.
sentences.cn: 各大学设备不足，难以满足招入的大量学生的要求。

sentences.en: When they leave school, they will be equipped for obtaining office jobs.
sentences.cn: 离校时，他们将有能力获得办公室工作的机会。

sentences.en: You can also tour the site on modern coaches equipped with videos.
sentences.cn: 您也可以乘坐配有视频设备的现代化长途汽车游览那处遗址。

words.tran_cn: 装备；预备（equip的过去分词）；整装

trans.tran_cn: 装备；预备（equip的过去分词）；整装
